p: For monocistronic (1MG) minigenome experiments ( Figure 5B), plasmids are described in [ 52]. In this system, EBOV RNA-directed RNA polymerase (L), viral cofactor proteins (VP30 and VP35), and NP were derived from the EBOV/Yam-May isolate and expressed from a pCAGGS vector. We replaced EBOV/Yam-May NP with EBOV/Mak-C15 NP and its mutants before measuring minigenome activity encoded by a firefly luciferase (FLuc) reporter gene.
